fu.hyphenation

Class Hyphenation

  • java.lang.Object
    • fu.hyphenation.Hyphenation

  • public class Hyphenation
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides functions to hyphenate German words.

    • Constructor Summary

      Hyphenation()

    • Constructor Detail

      • Hyphenation

        public Hyphenation()

    • Method Detail

      • setLastQueueSize

        public static void setLastQueueSize(int size)
        Defines the size of the queue of recent hyphenations. Hyphenations may be computationally expensive, thus it is a good ideas to keep the last results. This call defines, how many result should be kept.

      • bestHyphenation

        public static java.lang.String[] bestHyphenation(java.lang.String word)
        Gets the best (probably the correct) hyphenation for a given word. The result contains all syllables.

      • bestHyphenationPositions

        public static int[] bestHyphenationPositions(java.lang.String word)
        Gets the best (probably the correct) hyphenation for a given word. The result contains the position for divisions. e.g. 'Computer' returns the array {3, 5} as its hyphenation is Com-pu-ter. Note that the retured array always contains n-1 entries, where n is the number of syllables.

      • hyphenate

        public static java.util.ArrayList<HyphenateChoice> hyphenate(java.lang.String word)
        Gets all possible hyphenations of a certain German word. The result is ordered by its value (best choice first).
